summary: Hillary and Bonnie meet one morning by the side of the road. They become fast friends, share their secrets, and on a rising wave of frenzy later that afternoon, murder an old woman. They did it, they say later, for fun.
cast: Renée Humphrey|Alicia Witt|William R. Moses|Leslie Hope|Ania Suli|James J. Howard Jr.|Frederick D. Adams|Mary Ann Norment|Sabrina Ortega|Patrice F. Battle|Carmina Rubalcava|Malquele García|Cindie Northrup|Denise Fischer|Sharon Ben-Tal|Amy Bateman|Dena J. Pacitti|Cynthia Farris|Leah Kourtne Ballantine|Amanda Blackholly|Kimberly Ann Ross|Dana Maria Thomas|Ashley Michael Lauren|Rachelle Roderick|Steven Givens|Gregory Steven Ferrett|Steven A. Adelson|Victoria Radu|Jonathan Lightstone|Gillian Lightstone|Alexander Hecht|Elizabeth Hecht|James Youngman|Jaime Anderson|Chris Gillett
title: Fun
